Class Ray

extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a ray.

    2.0.0
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    William Bittle

      • Ray

        public Ray(Vector2 start,
   Vector2 direction)
        Creates a ray from the given start point in the given direction.
        Parameters:
        start - the start point
        direction - the direction; must be normalized
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if start or direction is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if direction is the zero vector
